description: Recognized for successfully completing Google's Cybersecurity Course, mastering essential skills in security protocols, threat identification, and risk mitigation.
Earned recognition for participating in a 3-day university-level Capture The Flag (CTF) event by Hack The Box, showcasing advanced problem-solving and ethical hacking expertise.
Certified for participating in an immersive cybersecurity job simulation, gaining practical experience in phishing attack analysis and response strategies.
Certification for a 7-day intensive Student Development Program at SIES GST, focusing on modern mobile and web development frameworks and best practices.
